title: Rivens supposed "OP mobility"
body:
Saw Darius coming at me. started running before he was in range of pull, spammed Q and E. he literally caught up with move speed ALONE and instagibbed me with his combo.

Can we please stop pretending that Riven is good or even viable.

When Darius has no mobility skills, and he outruns Riven yet people say her 4 gap closers are broken?
